DOC.brief_summary: The aim study compare trans-vaginal tape ( TVT ) trans-obturator tape ( TOT ) procedure female urinary stress incontinence intrinsic sphincter deficiency .
DOC.brief_title: TVT Versus TOT Urinary Stress Incontinence With No Intrinsic Sphincter Deficiency
DOC.detailed_description: Patients isolated stress incontinence attend Dr Zekai Tahir Burak Woman Health Teaching Research Hospital Urogynecology Department prospectively randomize , computer generate randomisation code , TVT TOT . The patient aware type surgical procedure operation . Preoperative evaluation include clinical history , urinanalysis , pelvic examination QoL assessment urodynamic study . QoL include Urogenital Distress Inventory Short Form ( UDI-6 ) Incontinence Impact Questionnaire Short Form ( IIQ-7 ) .Urodynamic study include cystometry , urethral profilometry Valsalva leak point pressure ( VLPP ) .In patient , pelvic floor defect evaluate accord POP quantification ( POPQ ) staging.To diagnose occult stress incontinence patient pelvic prolapse , cough test reduce prolapse performed.Patients follow 6 12 month postoperatively.Objective cure define negative cough stress test .Negative cough stress test , occasional urine leakage stress consider `` improved '' . Postoperative subjective outcome categorize follow : cure ( UDI-6 IIQ-7 postoperative < 10 ) , improve ( UDI-6 IIQ-7 postoperative > preoperative ) worsen ( UDI-6 IIQ-7 postoperative < preoperative ) .
DOC.criteria: Women urinary stress incontinence intrinsic sphincter deficiency Women without pelvic organ prolapse Previous incontinence surgery Urge incontinence overactive bladder Mixed incontinence Intrinsic sphincter deficiency Body mass index > 35 Unwilling randomisation
